about.metaDescription: Discover Basera's vision to become the leading real estate platform in the Middle East, empowering informed investment decisions.

hero.title: Empowering Your Real Estate Journey
hero.subtitle: basera is committed to delivering a comprehensive and unique real estate experience that goes far beyond sales. We provide advanced educational content and professional consultations to help you make confident, well-informed decisions.

vision.headline: Leading Real Estate Platform
vision.description: To position basera as the leading and most influential real estate platform in the Middle East — connecting people not only with apartments and compounds, but with a comprehensive vision for a fulfilling and impactful lifestyle.

pillars.title: Leading Platform in the Middle East
pillars.description: Positioning basera as the foremost educational and awareness-driven authority in the Arab world, standing among the industry's top enterprises.

pillars.title: Transforming Real Estate Investment
pillars.description: Driving the transformation of how people think about property, positioning us as thought leaders in the market.

pillars.title: Empowering Informed Decisions
pillars.description: Enabling individuals and investors to make conscious, data-driven choices with confidence and strategic insight.

pillars.title: Building a Sustainable Future
pillars.description: Creating an integrated real estate ecosystem focused on holistic living, strategic growth, and social responsibility.

mission.headline: Beyond Sales, Building
mission.description: basera is committed to delivering a comprehensive and unique real estate experience that goes far beyond sales. We provide advanced educational and awareness-driven content, alongside professional and trustworthy consultations.
elements: Deliver a holistic and distinctive real estate experience that extends beyond selling, focusing on building long-term, data-driven client relationships.
Differentiate from traditional real estate companies by offering a unique and enriching journey — not just the sale of a property.
Provide high-quality educational content that builds trust and enhances real estate awareness, supported by specialized and credible consulting services.
Empower clients with deep market insight and economic understanding, guiding them toward confident and wise investment choices.
Build long-term trust-based relationships that connect clients with the most suitable real estate opportunities for their needs and future goals.

items.title: Educational Leadership
items.description: Establish basera as the strongest real estate educational and awareness platform in the Arab world within the next four years.

items.title: Service Expansion
items.description: Expand our service scope to include B2B partnerships in addition to B2C clients, broadening our market reach.

items.title: Strategic Alliances
items.description: Strengthen partnerships with leading real estate companies in Egypt and across the Middle East.

values.headline: What Drives Us
values.description: Our core values define who we are and guide every decision we make at basera.

items.title: Commitment
items.description: We are dedicated to providing accurate and reliable information to our clients, ensuring trust in every interaction.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We continually evolve our services and products to meet our clients' changing needs and market demands.

items.title: Transparency
items.description: We maintain complete openness in all our dealings with clients and partners, fostering lasting relationships.

items.title: Excellence
items.description: We strive for distinction in everything we do to ensure an exceptional experience for our clients.

cta.headline: Ready to Start Your
cta.description: Join thousands of informed investors who trust basera for their real estate decisions.

legal.metaTitle: Legal Information - Privacy Policy, Terms of Service & Cookie Policy | basera Real Estate
legal.metaDescription: Read our Privacy Policy, Terms of Service, and Cookie Policy. Understand how we handle your data and the terms of using our services.

hero.title: Privacy, Terms & Policies
hero.subtitle: Transparency and trust are at the core of our commitment to you. Review our policies to understand how we protect your data and govern our services.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At basera Real Estate, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your data when you use our website and services. By accessing or using our platform, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
content: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact details provided during registration or inquiries
Property Preferences: Your search criteria, budget range, preferred locations, and property requirements
Usage Data: Pages visited, time spent on site, click patterns, and navigation history
Device Information: IP address, browser type, device identifiers, and operating system
Communication Records: Messages sent through our platform, inquiry history, and customer service interactions
Payment Information: When applicable, we may process payment data through secure third-party payment processors

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
content: Provide and improve our real estate services and platform functionality
Match you with relevant properties based on your preferences and requirements
Communicate with you about property listings, inquiries, and service updates
Send newsletters, market insights, and promotional materials (with your consent)
Process transactions and manage your account
Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience and platform performance
Comply with legal obligations and prevent fraudulent activities

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data with trusted third parties only in the following circumstances: property developers and agents (when you express interest in a property), service providers who assist in our operations (payment processors, cloud hosting, analytics), legal authorities when required by law, and business transfers in case of merger or acquisition. All third parties are required to maintain the confidentiality and security of your information.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including encryption, secure servers, access controls, and regular security assessments. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

userRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
content: Access: Request a copy of your personal data we hold
Correction: Update or correct inaccurate information
Deletion: Request removal of your personal data (subject to legal requirements)
Opt-Out: Unsubscribe from marketing communications at any time
Data Portability: Request your data in a structured, machine-readable format
Restriction: Request limitation of how we process your data
Withdraw Consent: Revoke consent for data processing where applicable

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. When data is no longer needed, we securely delete or anonymize it.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact us at privacy@basera-realestate.com or through our contact page.

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By accessing or using basera Real Estate's website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this platform.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: basera Real Estate provides a digital platform for browsing, searching, and inquiring about real estate properties in Egypt. We connect users with property listings, developers, and real estate professionals. We act as an intermediary platform and do not guarantee the accuracy, availability, or condition of listed properties.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
content: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access to your account
You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account
We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms

propertyListings.title: Property Listings
propertyListings.content: Property information, images, prices, and availability are provided by third parties (developers, agents, property owners) and are subject to change without notice. We make reasonable efforts to ensure accuracy but do not warrant the completeness or reliability of property information. Prices, specifications, and availability are subject to verification and may vary.

userConduct.title: Acceptable Use
content: Use our platform only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms
Do not post false, misleading, or fraudulent information
Do not attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or data
Do not use automated systems to scrape, harvest, or extract data without permission
Do not interfere with or disrupt the platform's functionality
Respect intellectual property rights and do not infringe upon copyrights or trademarks
Do not use the platform to transmit viruses, malware, or harmful code

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this platform, including text, graphics, logos, images, software, and designs, is the property of basera Real Estate or its licensors and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works without our express written permission.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, basera Real Estate and its affiliates shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, or business opportunities, arising from your use of our services. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid to us, if any, in the 12 months preceding the claim.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend, restrict, or terminate your access to our platform at any time, with or without cause or notice, for any reason including violation of these terms, fraudulent activity, or legal requirements. Upon termination, your right to use the platform will immediately cease.

modifications.title: Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Material changes will be communicated through our platform or via email. Your continued use of our services after changes become effective constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms of Service are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Egypt. Any disputes arising from these terms or your use of our services shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Egypt.

introduction.title: What Are Cookies
introduction.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience, analyze site usage, and customize content. This Cookie Policy explains how basera Real Estate uses cookies and similar technologies on our platform.

cookieTypes.title: Types of Cookies We Use
content: Essential Cookies: Required for the website to function properly. These enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility. They cannot be disabled.

Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information about pages visited, time spent, and user paths. We use this data to improve our platform.
Functional Cookies: Remember your preferences and settings (language, location, search filters) to provide a personalized experience during your visit and on return visits.
Targeting Cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and track campaign effectiveness. These may be set by advertising partners and are subject to their privacy policies.

purpose.title: Purpose of Cookies
content: Enable core website functionality and security features
Remember your preferences and settings for a personalized experience
Analyze website traffic and user behavior to improve our services
Track the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns
Provide relevant property recommendations based on your interests
Support social media integration and sharing features

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: We may use services from third-party providers that set their own cookies, including Google Analytics for website analytics, social media platforms for sharing features, and advertising networks for relevant ads. These third parties have their own privacy policies governing cookie usage.

managing.title: Managing Cookies
managing.content: You have the right to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can modify your browser settings to decline cookies if you prefer. However, disabling certain cookies may impact your experience and limit some functionality of our website.

browserSettings.title: Browser Cookie Settings
browserSettings.content: To manage cookies in your browser: Chrome - Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies, Firefox - Options > Privacy & Security > Cookies, Safari - Preferences > Privacy > Cookies, Edge - Settings > Privacy > Cookies. Please note that blocking all cookies may affect website functionality.

updates.title: Updates to Cookie Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, legislation, or our practices. The updated policy will be posted on this page with a revised 'Last Updated' date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
